title: smtm
author: smtm
content: I did some research on it, by the stats Elrond should be one of the top competitors, but $ wise it been on decline for ages now.What do i miss? Why is Elrond rather unpopular?Did the $ go to Solana?

comments.author: bittick

Why is Elrond rather unpopular?Did the $ go to Solana?  Yeah all of money have been going to the hyped blockchain like solana. Elron was not a popular blockchain. This blockchain was not so good as solana blockchain. These days people will be moving to the blockchain that was adopting the pretty similar mechanism like ethereum. It doesn't mean elrond was bad but i remember when there were bunch of bad rumour and news about this blockchain. that makes the movement was not so fast like another blockchain like solana. Elron was an alternative blockchain as well.

comments.author: Iadegbola34
comments.body: Elrond is generally better than Solana in terms of utility and would probably maintain its edge well into the future. In addition, Elrond is used relatively more in transactions, despite it being roughly as old as Solana. Given Elrond's utility, its market cap of €1.7b indicates it is most probably undervalued compared to Solana which has a market cap of €13.8b.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Elrond EGLD, Solana SOL and other central networks have gained momentum with the transfer of applications (DeFi) to them, as their decentralized platforms are fast and do not need a lot of money in gas, but at the present time there are questions about proving the stake as being feasible, and therefore I think that more people will prefer currencies with proof of work more than proof of stake .Don't forget that Ethereum will move to Proof of Stake in August, and if it succeeds, most altcoins will lose their popularity, so the money may not flow to them.And finally the state of the market and the end of the hybrid that accompanied SOL with stories like what happened with Luna.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: I am not sure about Solana now. But when Solana started, Solana was the best alternative for Ethereum especially when there was an issue about a clogged network on Ethereum and a lot of people started to find some alternative, and Solana came.But look at now, there are already lof cases happening on Solana especially since the network is started to clogged and there are hours that no transactions are being processed.

comments.author: Sterbens
comments.body: Quote from: smtm on May 31, 2022, 12:09:30 PMI did some research on it, by the stats Elrond should be one of the top competitors, but $ wise it been on decline for ages now.What do i miss? Why is Elrond rather unpopular?Did the $ go to Solana?  Perhaps so far Elrond has not presented many promising projects for investors or traders. The absence of programs that should be an attraction for crypto adoption to be more active and encourage price increases. If we look at the difference between Elrond and Solana, it will be clear that investors are interested in Solana who is active in building new projects, and the benefits offered. Programs such as Holder, staking, and Pool in snapshot time to get prize allocation and things that certainly make investors have a profitable output.

comments.body: It's caused by elrond as not so good as solana. You must see how the solana developers are very active and it has support by some big exchange site like FTX unlike elrond that didn't have any support. I remember when SBF was actively pushing people to use solana blockchain and that has become the main reason why solana can be as big as this time. Elrond needs to push people to use its platform as well or this will never able to be the same like solana. Elrond was not equal with solana. Elrond's growth is very less compared with solana caused by its ecosystem is slowly doing expansion.

comments.author: wiss19
comments.body: What did you miss? You miss the best times of the coin but you can always try investing in it and hope that it can recover and surpass its last ATH. I didn't hear a lot of comparisons between Elrond and solana. I also think both of them are not in the same nature. Maybe there are times where their value are close to each other, that's why someone can compare them but now the value of elrond have drop drastically, it wasn't considered to be a competitor of solana anymore.Elrond is actually pretty popular before. This coin was showing in the trend page of coinmarketcap and they also have done a marketing there but like any other older coins, they can't always be on the trend. Maybe some Elrond investors have sold some of their coins and then invested it in solana because solana is also on the trend last time.
